title: Top 3 MS Office Exploits Hackers Use in 2025 – Stay Alert!
description: Hackers have long used Word and Excel documents as delivery vehicles for malware, and in 2025, these tricks are far from outdated. From phishing schemes to zero-click exploits, malicious Office files are still one of the easiest ways into a victim’s system.
